players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: " I'm concerned about Charlie's death and want to know more about what happened."
You: "I'm not sure what happened to Charlie, but I think we should focus on finding the killer."
Diana: "I'm going to investigate Bob. He seemed suspicious when Charlie died."
Bob: "I'm innocent and I want to help find the killer. Diana, can you tell us what made you suspicious of me?"
